snippet: Visit Kara Walker’s giant sugar coated sphinx in Brooklyn, see what a Don Quixote ballet looks like at the MET or check out some medieval stained glass at the Cloisters.
abstract: Visit Kara Walker’s giant sugar coated sphinx in Brooklyn, see what a Don Quixote ballet looks like at the MET or check out some medieval stained glass at the Cloisters.

headline.main: This Weekend: The Marvelous Sugar Baby
headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
